subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Rickie Fowler, 21, is the first PGA Tour rookie to be chosen for the Ryder Cup, but the pick came as no surprise to those who know him well.
snippet: Rickie Fowler, 21, is the first PGA Tour rookie to be chosen for the Ryder Cup, but the pick came as no surprise to those who know him well.
